allow: Bash(node -e "const html = require\(''fs''\).readFileSync\(''index.html'', ''utf8''\); const match = html.match\(/const proyectos = \(\\[[\\s\\S]*?\\]\);/\); if\(match\) { try { eval\(''const p = '' + match[1]\); console.log\(''OK - Total proyectos:'', eval\(match[1]\).length\); } catch\(e\) { console.log\(''ERROR:'', e.message\); } } else { console.log\(''No match found''\); }")
